original_text: I, the Lord, have sent my special men. I am very angry. Those men are my brave soldiers who will punish Babylon on my behalf. They are proud because I have made them strong.
korean_text: 내가 거룩하게 구별한 자들에게 명령하고 나의 위엄을 기뻐하는 용사들을 불러 나의 노여움을 전하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I, the Lord, have sent my special men.
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주께서 나의 특별한 사람들을 보냈다.

sentences.original_text: Those men are my brave soldiers
who will punish Babylon on my behalf.
because I have made them strong.
